item.title: Justin Trudeau and Katy Perry Are Worth Rooting For
item.description: As a politician, Justin Trudeau was an excellent celebrity. And the rest of the world could learn a useful lesson from how he wielded his star power.

item.title: Palo Alto Confronts Billionaires Over Their Housing Compounds
item.description: The Silicon Valley college town has changed drastically as Mark Zuckerberg, Larry Page and other tech founders have scooped up multiple properties.

item.title: After Rob Reiner’s ‘North’ Flopped, He Proved He Could Take Criticism With Humor
item.description: Roger Ebert said he “hated, hated, hated, hated, hated” Reiner’s 1994 film “North.” The director took it in stride.
